short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rebooking your hotel room to save you money!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hotels employ revenue maximization companies with dynamic pricing to squeeze their customers for every last cent that they're willing to give. Here at Breeze, we put the power of algorithms back into the hands of the consumer. We ensure that you pay the best price possible, not just the best price that you are shown.

To save on your bookings, simply navigate to your hotel of choice on the Booking website then click the "Book with Breeze" button! We will automatically secure the exact same room at the lowest price offered between when you book and when you stay, refunding you for half of the savings we find as soon as you check in. 

Stop stressing. Let our computers do the work and save money while you sleep. Download our extension and start booking with Breeze!
